title: Parent organizing for family-friendly community policies
description: Parent organizing for family-friendly community policies
content:
Scenario: Parent organizing for family-friendly community policies
    Given community policies affect families' quality of life
    And Sarah wants better parks, libraries, family resources
    When parents organize for policy change
    Then the community_elohim should facilitate collective advocacy
    And it should coordinate parent political power
    And organizing labor should accumulate care tokens
    And Sarah's advocacy should be recognized as community contribution
    And parent collective action should be amplified by care economy
    And the system should translate care work into political power
